title: Preseason IP turns Blue
body:
what is the NA  conversion ?
i saw something like 6.5

replies.body:
NA has special conversion rate. its 1:1.
Rest of the world has 6,5.
Why NA would have different conversion rate than rest of the world?

This isn't quite right. 

When Preseason hits your current BE will be multiplied by 6.5 and then added to your IP.
thank you my friend for the clarification
